00060 class VTK_ESQUI_UTILITIES_EXPORT vtkPointPlotter : public vtkObject {
00061 
00062 public:
00063     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkPointPlotter,vtkObject);
00064 
00065     static vtkPointPlotter *New();
00066 
00067     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkPointPlotter";};
00068 
00069     void Init();
00070 
00071     void Update();
00072 
00073     void Reset();
00074 
00075     void SetRadius(double radius = 0.025){this->Radius = radius;};
00076 
00077     void SetResolution(int resolution = 12){this->Resolution = resolution;};
00078 
00079     void SetRenderer(vtkRenderer * renderer){this->Renderer = renderer;};
00080 
00081     vtkActor * GetActor(){return this->Actor;};
00082 
00083     vtkPolyData * GetPolyData(){return this->PolyData;};
00084 
00085     void InsertPoint(double x, double y, double z, unsigned char r, unsigned char g, unsigned char b);
00086 
00087 protected:
00088     vtkPointPlotter();
00089     ~vtkPointPlotter();
00090 private:
00091 
00092     vtkPoints * Points;
00093     vtkUnsignedCharArray * Scalars;
00094 
00095     vtkPolyData * PolyData;
00096     vtkGlyph3D * Glyphs;
00097     vtkSphereSource * Spheres;
00098 
00099     vtkActor * Actor;
00100     vtkPolyDataMapper * Mapper;
00101 
00102     vtkRenderer * Renderer;
00103 
00104     double Radius;
00105     vtkIdType Resolution;
00106 
00107     vtkPointPlotter (const vtkPointPlotter &);//NotImplemented
00108     void operator =(const vtkPointPlotter &);//Not Implemented
00109 };
